Frank, Reading all the BS those two were spewing on a daily basis, did not =
contribute one positive idea or thought. This is your group and I support y=
our decision to do whatever you feel is necessary to keep the group intact =
and a pleasant place to be. =C2=A0
I, for one am sick and tired of those wh=
o demand "scientific" evidence, when dealing with a reality =C2=A0which is =
not scientifically based and never will be. =C2=A0Those who wish to walk do=
wn that narrow minded path will never experience what we have experienced. =
=C2=A0Thank you for your willingness to "uninvite" those who only want to p=
lace negativity into the group.
Jan

--- On Thu, 8/26/10, Frank Sumption <p=
urplealiengirl@...> wrote:

From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@gma=
il.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: A suggestion for less hostility
To: "Rj"=
 <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Thursday, August 26, 2010, 10:48 PM






=









 
=C2=A0



  


    
      
      
      =C2=A0I'll repeat it jus=
t to be clear. The two I kicked off never accepted any evidence, ignored al=
l examples of voices=C2=A0others posted, regardless of how clear they were.=
 Claimed all they heard was gibbersih from the boxes, yet presented themsel=
ves as somehow=C2=A0more qualified to test the paranormal. Always no data, =
no evidence, while ignoring everything presented.=C2=A0 They tend to imply =
all the EVP voices were the brain trying to make sense out of chaotic noise=
, nothing more. When questioned as to their motives they acuse me of attack=
ing them. 

=C2=A0
=C2=A0I've been doing this stuff for ten years, and the =
two were pretty typical of most debunker/skeptics who deny deny deny, ignor=
e ignore ignore and claim a higher intellect.=C2=A0I reached my saturation =
point. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0They wanted to quote the statement on the group home p=
age, which in fact states I will kick off people that appear to be debunker=
s. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Other methods are fine, not methods of debunking though! T=
he box is one method of supplying the raw audio, just as white noise is a m=
ethod of supplying the raw audio. My opinion is that the spirits and entiti=
es communicate best if they have something to make their voices out of, and=
 the box, aka a swept radio, provides bits of speech music and noise for th=
at purpose. I do not know anything about the so called paranormal, I don't =
do "investigations", don't go to haunted areas to get EVPs. I do this stuff=
 out of curiosity, and remain intrigued with these voices from a "broken ra=
dio". It really pisses me off to have someone who can't hear the stuff tell=
 me what it really is. 

=C2=A0
=C2=A0Frank-S






=C2=A0


    
     

  =
